content.c_venueAddress: 85-88 St Martin's Ln, Charing Cross, London WC2N 4AP
content.name: Slave Play

primaryPhoto.description:
This summer, SLAVE PLAY is playing at the intimate Noël Coward Theatre for a strictly limited run.
Jeremy O.Harris’s extraordinary play about race, identity and sexuality in twenty-first century America will be directed by Robert O’Hara for its unmissable upcoming season.
The iconic, controversial, ground-breaking and most Tony Nominated play of all time comes to London. Fisayo Akinade, Kit Harington, Aaron Heffernan and Olivia Washington star alongside James Cusati-Moyer, Chalia La Tour, Annie McNamara, and Irene Sofia Lucio who reprise their roles from the original Broadway Production.
Book your SLAVE PLAY theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
